---
title: "View documentation activity"
date: last-modified
---

Use the audit trail functionality in the {{< var validmind.platform >}} to track or audit all the information events associated with a specific model.

::: {.prereq}

## Prerequisites

<!-- ::: {.callout}
This topic matters for model developers, model validators, and auditors.
::: -->

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory.[^1]
- [x] Model documentation has already been created for this project.[^2]
- [x] A model developer has started generating documentation, either using the {{< var vm.developer >}}[^3] or via the online UI editor.

:::

## Steps[^4]

{{< include _view-documentation-activity-steps.qmd >}}

#### Search, filter, and sort activity

Use the top buttons to narrow down and organize model activity to your preference:

- Search for activity using **{{< fa magnifying-glass >}} Search**. 

- Use **{{< fa filter >}} Filter** to filter activity by type or user.

- Use **{{< fa arrow-up-wide-short >}} Sort** to sort results by certain criteria.

:::{.callout}
Changes are automatically saved and will affect only your account.
:::
